sys_hub_flow.description: Check for overdue NeedIt Tasks, close the overdue tasks, update the work notes for the task with a reason, and log the automatic closure

sys_hub_flow.name: Check NeedIt Overdue Task

sys_hub_trigger_instance.comment: Run the flow weekly on Fridays at 11 pm.
sys_hub_trigger_instance.name: Weekly

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Get the value of the x_58872_needit.autoCloseOverdue application property to determine how old a task should be to automatically close it.
Use the Get Days Ago Date action to calculate the overdue date to compare against due dates.
Find open NeedIt Tasks with a Due date older than the number of days set in the property.

sys_hub_sub_flow_instance.comment: Update each overdue NeedIt Task with the Handle Overdue NeedIt Tasks subflow. Pass the Number of the NeedIt Task record in the Subflow's Reason inpu

sys_element_mapping.value: NeedIt Task {{3e6883cb-17fa-4cce-be51-a28c4ae4fdf5.item.number}} was automatically closed because its Due date of {{3e6883cb-17fa-4cce-be51-a28c4ae4fdf5.item.due_date}} was older than the autoCloseOverdue setting of {{70a0137f-789b-4fe5-8100-22ba2e77a0c7.property_value}} days.

sys_hub_sub_flow_instance_inputs.label: Wait For Completion
sys_hub_sub_flow_instance_inputs.name: var__m_sys_hub_sub_flow_instance_inputs_00354d0d1b80011055b4a9b4bd4bcbeb
